    • Method Detail

      • deny

        void deny(Resource resource,
          Session session)
   throws com.adobe.cq.social.commons.CommentException
        Process a comment deny request sent by a client.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to deny
        session - the session used to deny
        Throws:
        com.adobe.cq.social.commons.CommentException - when the session cannot save the changes in the comment system

      • deny

        void deny(java.util.List<Resource> resourceList,
          Session session,
          ResourceResolver resourceResolver)
   throws com.adobe.cq.social.commons.CommentException
        Process a bulk comment deny request sent by a client.
        Parameters:
        resourceList - an array of resources to deny
        session - the user session requesting the bulk deny
        resourceResolver - the resource resolver
        Throws:
        com.adobe.cq.social.commons.CommentException - for any exception, including when the session cannot save the change

      • flag

        void flag(Resource resource,
          java.lang.String flagReason,
          boolean doFlag,
          java.lang.String userId)
   throws com.adobe.cq.social.commons.CommentException,
          OperationException
        Process a comment flag request sent by a client.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to flag
        flagReason - the reason the UGC is being flagged for moderation
        doFlag - flag if true, remove a flag if false
        userId - the id of the user flagging the comment
        Throws:
        com.adobe.cq.social.commons.CommentException - when the session cannot save the changes in the comment system
        OperationException - when the flag action can't be performed on resource

      • allow

        void allow(Resource resource,
           Session session,
           java.lang.String userId)
    throws com.adobe.cq.social.commons.CommentException
        Process an allow request sent by a client. Sets the UGC status back to okay.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to allow
        session - the session used to allow
        userId - id of the originating user
        Throws:
        com.adobe.cq.social.commons.CommentException - when the session cannot save the changes in the comment system

      • allow

        void allow(java.util.List<Resource> resourceList,
           Session session,
           ResourceResolver resourceResolver)
    throws com.adobe.cq.social.commons.CommentException
        Process a bulk comment allow request sent by a client.
        Parameters:
        resourceList - an array of resources to allow
        session - the user session requesting the bulk allow
        resourceResolver - the resource resolver
        Throws:
        com.adobe.cq.social.commons.CommentException - for any exception, including when the session cannot save the change

      • close

        void close(Resource sessionResource,
           Session session,
           boolean close)
        Process a close/open request sent by a client.
        Parameters:
        sessionResource - the resource to close
        session - the session used to close
        close - true if the request is to close content, false if it is to open.
        Throws:
        com.adobe.cq.social.commons.CommentException - when the session cannot save the changes in the comment system

           ResourceResolver resolver,

        session - the session used to close
        resolver - ResourceResolver
        close - true if the request is to close content, false if it is to open.
        Throws:

         Session session,
         boolean pin)
        Process a pin/unpin request sent by a client.
        Parameters:
        sessionResource - the resource to pin
        session - the session used to pin
        pin - true if the request is to pin content, false if it is to unpin.

      • toggleFeatured

        void toggleFeatured(Resource sessionResource,
                    Session session,
                    boolean markFeatured)
        Process a Feature / unFeature request sent by a client.
        Parameters:
        sessionResource - - the resource to Feature / unFeature
        session - - the session used to Feature / unFeature
        markFeatured - - true if the request is to mark a content as featured, false if it is to unFeature.
        Throws:
        com.adobe.cq.social.commons.CommentException - - when the session cannot save the changes in the comment system

      • toggleFeatured

        void toggleFeatured(java.util.List<Resource> resourceList,
                    Session session,
                    ResourceResolver resolver,
                    boolean markFeatured)
        Process a bulk Feature / unFeature request sent by a client.
        Parameters:
        resourceList - an array of resources to Feature / unFeature
        session - - the session used to Feature / unFeature
        resolver - ResourceResolver
        markFeatured - - true if the request is to mark a content as featured, false if it is to unFeature.
        Throws:
        com.adobe.cq.social.commons.CommentException - - when the session cannot save the changes in the comment system
